rows.name: question_prep_time
rows.value: How many minutes did it take you to prepare for the session?

rows.name: question_travel_time
rows.value: How many minutes did it take you to travel to the location where the session was delivered?

rows.name: question_participants
rows.value: Which of the parents in your group attended your in-person session?
